name: Khana Indian Grill
description: Khana Indian Grill offers authentic Indian cuisine with a focus on modern Indian cooking. They have a lean menu featuring snacks, rice dishes, rolls, and sides, including a "Bengali Shrimp" option

name: Isha The Taste of India
description: This restaurant serves freshly prepared Indian delicacies with authentic spices and traditional cooking methods

name: Saffron Indian Cuisine Bar & Grill
description: Saffron Indian Cuisine Bar & Grill is known for its delicious Indian dishes and fresh beers, offering a wide variety of appetizers, curries, and seafood dishes

name: Bawarchi Biryanis
address: 11121 N Rodney Parham Rd, Little Rock, AR 72212
description: Bawarchi Biryanis offers authentic Hyderabadi Biryani and a versatile pan-Indian menu in a modern fine-dine setting

name: Taj Mahal
address: 11121 N Rodney Parham Rd, Little Rock, AR 72212
description: Taj Mahal serves fresh and delicious Indian dishes in Little Rock, with a mission to provide an amazing dining experience. They offer popular items like Chicken Biryani and Saag Paneer

name: Curry Leaf Indian Cuisine
description: Curry Leaf Indian Cuisine brings authentic flavors of India to Jonesboro, featuring rich curries, tandoori delights, and vegetarian specialties

name: Bay Leaf Indian Cuisine
description: Bay Leaf Indian Cuisine offers a delectable fusion of Indian and Indo-Chinese cuisine, from savory soups to succulent tandoori grills

name: Bawarchi Indian Cuisine
description: Bawarchi Indian Cuisine serves a pan-Indian menu in a contemporary setting, offering dine-in, online ordering, and catering services

name: Curry House
description: Aladdin Sweets & Restaurant is recognized for serving authentic Bengali food, with a reviewer noting it was like home cooking but more professional and tastier
